description: React component implementing a chat panel UI with message display and input handling, utilizing hooks for state and effects, interacting with an API for chat responses.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Handles sending messages: sanitizes input, updates message state, calls API for response, handles errors, and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events in input box, triggers message sending on Enter key press.
